Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbals! (Best thing to say I could come up with  )

I am a slightly experienced KSP player who has just joined here. I'm looking forward to joining discussions and posting here! 

Oh, you're still reading? Well I guess I could introduce myself.

I've been playing KSP for a while now (125 hours to be specific), but for some reason I hadn't joined here until now. I'm a gamer from Finland who is interested in chemistry, physics, tech, rockets and other science stuff. But even though I have been playing KSP for a while, I still haven't got to Minmus.

Well, that's about it. Have a nice day!

Hello TenX and welcome to the forum!  (I start every single greeting I give this way.)

We have a very international community here and, of course, a lot of people who are very interested in science.

Minmus is easier to land on and return from than the Mun.

Happy landings!

@TenX

Okay, you are in, well done!
Oh, and terve!
